## Welcome

Hi! I’m Alexis Means, a master’s student teaming up with the University of Idaho and the Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife. Together, we’re diving into the wild world of bighorn sheep, exploring how their nutritional choices shape their populations. You could say I’m studying what’s on the menu for our fuzzy friends—and how it impacts their survival and growth!
